‚òÖWhy Jobflow?‚òÖ
It takes both speed and quality to get hired. You need to apply before your application is buried under hundreds of others. And you need to sell yourself as the perfect fit for the role. To stand out from the crowd, hiring managers will say you need to tailor your job application materials.

The problem is you aren't a writer, and you don't have time to figure out how to tailor your resume and research every employer to write an effective cover letter. 

We developed Jobflow to automate this work for you.  Drawing on our Founder's 20 years in online employment and talent acquisition, Jobflow blends deep hiring insights with the power of AI to automate the optimization and tailoring of resumes and cover letters for each job a candidate applies to‚Äîin seconds. 

Try it today at https://www.myjobflow.com/ or contact us for assistance at Success@myjobflow.com.
